content.rendered:
Advisory

We will provide Innovative Solutions to those Issues!

Aside providing direct financial accommodation to clients, FundQuest delivers tailored solutions and value-adding services that assist clients tackle personal finance and business challenges. Our team of experienced industry specialists are available to work with you in building business and financial solutions aligned to your goals, values and risk tolerance disposition. Our unique approach to delivering sustainable value to clients in capital raising, business restructuring, Balance Sheet management, project financing and other specialized financial services makes us an ideal partner in your journey to growth, expansion and competitive superiority.

Our clientele extends through the major sectors of the Nigerian economy, including:

  • Oil & Gas
  • Financial Services
  • Media & Entertainment
  • Telecommunications
  • Hotels & Hospitality
  • Renewable Energy
  • Food & Agriculture

In any industry our client plays, we provide Business Advisory services across four broad areas of value propositions.

  • Financial Advisory and Consultancy
  • Business and Financial Research
  • Capital Raising
  • Corporate Restructuring

Financial Advisory and Consultancy

Personal and business finance problems can be very complex and oftentimes, solutions to such require drawing from the wealth of knowledge of financial experts. Let us guide you in making comprehensive and strategic financial choices as you navigate those structural and environmental challenges facing your business. Our financial advisory experts are ready to work with you, providing you with top-notch financial advice and supporting you all the way through the implementation phase of the recommended solutions. You can reach out to us today for:

  • Personal Finance and Wealth Management
  • Balance Sheet Restructuring and Management
  • Financial Statements Preparation
  • Management Buyouts
  • Leveraged Buyouts
Tell Us Your Need

Business and Financial Research

Information is the oil that keeps top businesses ahead of the curve. At FundQuest, we provide deep and detailed research analysis with the aim of keeping your business informed and strategically positioned in your industry. Our research process is profound and our recommendations are objective, comprehensive and constructive. Let us avail you the experience and expertise of our research team, covering areas such as:

  • Market and Economic Research
  • Financial Research and Modelling
  • Feasibility Studies
  • Business Plans and Growth Strategies
Tell Us Your Need

Capital Raising

Whether as a start-up or an existing business, raising ownership or working capital is usually an arduous task, especially when you have to combine this with your core operational and strategic responsibilities. Let our team of market experts do the job for you. Our years of experience doing this will certainly help determine what type of financing is the best fit for your business, both in terms of cost and availability. We will also be there to open your funding proposal to our extensive database of investors ready to provide the requisite investment. Our capital raising services can cover any of:

    • Debt Capital Raising
    • Equity Capital Raising
    • Hybrid Capital Raising
Tell Us Your Need

Corporate Restructuring

Top performing organisations are those that constantly seek to maximise their corporate value. You don’t have to wait until you experience a supply chain breakdown, cash crunch, credit squeeze, or customer churn before considering a business turnaround or restructuring. Let our team of experts guide you in repositioning your business for sustainable growth, efficiency and optimal performance. Our service offerings include:

  • Corporate Turnaround
  • Debt Negotiation and Restructuring
  • Mergers and Acquisitions
  • Joint Venture
Tell Us Your Need

Unable to find a suitable product? You may wish to consider our Quest Suite of Savings/Investment bundles here or simply contact our Help Centre

Investments

Leases

Loans

Quest Suite
